data.name: Enigmarella
data.detailed_description:
A Visual Novel set in a nautical steampunk universe, Enigmarella is the story of Alice, an orphan, whose life takes an unexpected turn when she is forced into an arranged marriage.

With multiple paths, and unique endings -where choices really make a huge difference-, Enigmarella is a tale about romance, friendship, fate, mystery, and some strange medical experiments.

Key Features:
- Fully voiced, immersive experience
- Masterfully rendered realistic style art
- 16 truly unique endings
- Awesome original soundtrack by Myuu
- And of course, our lovely, hot-headed, selfish, rebellious anti-heroine: Alice Rahner
data.about_the_game:
A Visual Novel set in a nautical steampunk universe, Enigmarella is the story of Alice, an orphan, whose life takes an unexpected turn when she is forced into an arranged marriage.

With multiple paths, and unique endings -where choices really make a huge difference-, Enigmarella is a tale about romance, friendship, fate, mystery, and some strange medical experiments.

Key Features:

- And of course, our lovely, hot-headed, selfish, rebellious anti-heroine: Alice Rahner
data.short_description: Happy birthday Alice Rahner! You will be forced into an arranged marriage. Of course, falling in love with your new husband is entirely up to you. With 16 truly unique endings, are you willing to follow your heart?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 260 GT Series or ATI equivalent with 512MB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: Contains some nudity, depictions of consensual sexual acts, alcohol abuse, some violence, references to self-harm
